name: Line 98: Classic Lines PC
description:
Line 98 is an intellectual and relaxing mobile game playing on 9×9 board with different colored bubbles. Line 98 could be very familiar to all ages with the ideas from the classic game which was really popular in 1990s. The goal is very simple: players need to arrange all same-color bubbles into lines (horizontally, vertically or diagonally) to make them explode and score points. It is easy to play, but to become a master is a challenge. The more combos of the line you can make, the higher the score you will get.

Outstanding features:
. The visual artworks, sounds, and game mechanism are as same as the original one.
. Resume last gameplay option.
. Easily share the high score with your friends on Facebook.

Enjoy Line 98 on mobile now!
